CC3C0A8F.FlavorText: A letter from Airidah discussing the forgotten dead.

F2CA04D8.NoticeSignText:
To bury so many of my brothers and sisters... Their faces I cannot unsee.
Those I mentored, and those who mentored me in kind are now forgotten.
All that I can offer them is song and ceremony, but it never seems enough.
Walking these halls, I feel the weight of their sacrifice.
